666930.name: Luxocraft
666930.description:
3D Ray Tracing Block Construction Builder Free Video Game, supporting users generated free and paid items for sale.
Block building game, in which the world construction system is a very similar to Minecraft creating regime, using 346 unlimited customizing materials and 32 basic shapes in two game modes- 1st person builder and 1st person explorer/walker.
Use Ray Tracing technology to create as beautiful as you can imagine dynamic worlds, scenes, levels, items.
Share [free] or sell [paid] your items in the Steam Workshop.

Which is the most beautiful scene you can possible create, limited only by your hardware- the mind and the computer?

  • alpha v5.0 [14.09.2020 at 08:58:27 EEST] - Upgrade from UE4.23.0 to UE4.25.1 + four new environments- atmospheric sky, clouds, mirror and water grounds [READY]
  • alpha v4.0 [07.07.2020 at 14:30:26 EEST] - Automatic Non-Repeating Textures Patterns + 69 new materials [READY]
  • alpha v3.0 [12.05.2020 at 18:13:42 EEST] - Steam Stats, Achievements and Leaderboards [READY]
  • alpha v2.0 [17.04.2020 at 09:02:10 EEST] - Integrated Steam Workshop [READY]
  • alpha v1.0 [25.02.2020 at 16:33:18 EET] - Luxocraft (upgrade from UE4.12.5 to UE4.23.0) [READY]
  • alpha v1.0 [17.07.2017 at 11:11:00 EEST] - Celestial Creator [READY]

1.Free maps and items:

2.Paid maps and items:


50% creator revenue share.
As creator, your creator revenue split is 50% of each paid map, level, scene and item posted in the Steam Workshop.
50% is the percentage of revenue an item creator receives from direct sales of their item.
Item Creators Can Earn Royalties via Steam Workshop.
Items from this Workshop that are accepted for sale will pay the creators a 50% split of the revenue if that item is sold for a fee.


Ray Tracing support for NVIDIA 20 Series Graphics Cards [Turing RTX][Complex RT Effects][Multiple RT Effects][High Ray Count]:
•Titan RTX
•RTX 2080 Ti
•RTX 2080 Super
•RTX 2070 Super
•RTX 2060 Super
•RTX 2080
•RTX 2070
•RTX 2060
Ray Tracing support for NVIDIA Volta GPU Architecture Graphics Cards [Volta][Basic RT Effects][Low Ray Count]:
•Titan V
Ray Tracing support for NVIDIA 16 Series Graphics Cards [Turing][Basic RT Effects][Low Ray Count]:
•GeForce GTX 1660 Ti
•GeForce GTX 1660 Super
•GeForce GTX 1660
Ray Tracing support for NVIDIA 10 Series Graphics Cards [Pascal][Basic RT Effects][Low Ray Count]:
•TITAN XP (2017)
•TITAN X (2016)
•GeForce GTX 1080 Ti
•GeForce GTX 1080
•GeForce GTX 1070 Ti
•GeForce GTX 1070
•GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
NVIDIA graphics driver v425.31 [11.Apr.2019] - the minimum, supporting for DirectX Raytracing (DXR) technology

Luxocraft is an updated and modified version of the original Celestial Creator (released on 17.07.2017) game, but with some changed, new features and most important - support of the Ray Tracing Technology - "The Magic Rays" or "The Gods Rays".
Almost all materials have visual identity (thumbnails) and names to the UE4 Editor materials for easy recognizing from UE4 users community.
However, if you change only one from many customization parameters with one or two clicks, you can create completely new, unique and custom material and looks.
Grow your creativity and innovations with one click.
